body_html: In a new environment, maybe you need reinstall it. If it doesn't work , try to change the way installing. At first, I used pip installing, got the error. then I changed to use conda installing, the error gone. 发自坚果 Pro Weiwen Chen <notifications@github.com> 于 2018年6月15日 下午7:31写道： I have another stituation, I have succssfully installed tensorflow on my mac, and a function which uses tensorflow's model can run by its own. However, when I import this fuction in Django, the first line is 'import tensorflow as tf', error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tensorflow'.. wtf ― You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
In a new environment, maybe you need reinstall it. If it doesn't work , try to change the way installing.
At first, I used pip installing, got the error. then I changed to use conda installing, the error gone.

发自坚果 Pro

Weiwen Chen <notifications@github.com> 于 2018年6月15日 下午7:31写道：


I have another stituation, I have succssfully installed tensorflow on my mac, and a function which uses tensorflow's model can run by its own. However, when I import this fuction in Django, the first line is 'import tensorflow as tf', error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tensorflow'.. wtf

―

body:
In a new environment, maybe you need reinstall it. If it doesn't work , try to change the way installing.
At first, I used pip installing, got the error. then I changed to use conda installing, the error gone.

发自坚果 Pro

Weiwen Chen <notifications@github.com> 于 2018年6月15日 下午7:31写道：


I have another stituation, I have succssfully installed tensorflow on my mac, and a function which uses tensorflow's model can run by its own. However, when I import this fuction in Django, the first line is 'import tensorflow as tf', error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tensorflow'.. wtf

―
